name: RedeemableERC20Factory
description: RedeemableERC20Factory. Factory for deploying and registering `RedeemableERC20` contracts.

eventDecorators.name: NewContract
eventDecorators.description: Whenever a new child contract is deployed, a `NewContract` event containing the new child contract address MUST be emitted.

functionDecorators.name: createChild
functionDecorators.description: Implements `IFactory`. Calls the _createChild hook, which inheriting contracts must override. Registers child contract address such that `isChild` is `true`. Emits `NewContract` event.

parameterDecorators.name: data_
parameterDecorators.description: Encoded data to pass down to child contract constructor.

functionDecorators.name: createChild
functionDecorators.description: Allows calling `createChild` with `RedeemableERC20Config` struct. Use original `Factory` `createChild` function signature if function parameters are already encoded.

functionDecorators.name: isChild
functionDecorators.description: Implements `IFactory`. Checks if address is registered as a child contract of this factory.

parameterDecorators.name: maybeChild_
parameterDecorators.description: Address of child contract to look up.

returnDecorators.description: Returns `true` if address is a contract created by this contract factory, otherwise `false`.
